name: Siebel: Applets from the same view cannot have the same title
associatedValueName: Other applet with same name in the view
description: This rule reports Applets having the same title and included in the same view.
output:
This rule reports Applets having the same title and included in the same view. It displays:
-the applet full name
- the associated value give the applet title and view name
rationale: Do not use the same title for more than one applet that Siebel CRM displays in the same view. If a view contains multiple applets that display data from the same business component, then distinguish the titles according to the type of applet.
remediation: For example, use distinct titles in a view that displays accounts, such as Account List Applet or Account Form Applet.
total: Number of added or modified applets
alternativeName: Siebel: Applets from the same view cannot have the same title
